archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.3.7d: d) restricting the use of special access privileges to narrowly defined circumstances (e.g. on a need to use or an event-by-event basis, or for a specific time limit)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
